description: This file defines an abstract generic class 'BaseMapper' that provides conversion methods between entity objects and Data Transfer Objects (DTOs). It includes abstract methods for conversion, as well as concrete implementations for converting collections between these two types with stream processing.

classes.name: BaseMapper
classes.description: An abstract generic class providing a template for bi-directional conversion between entities and DTOs, along with methods for converting collections of these objects.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Abstract method to convert a DTO to its corresponding entity, with optional additional arguments.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Abstract method to convert an entity to its corresponding DTO, with optional additional arguments.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a Collection of DTOs to a Collection of entities using the abstract convertToEntity method.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a Collection of entities to a Collection of DTOs using the abstract convertToDto method.

methods.name: convertToEntityList
methods.description: Converts a Collection of DTOs to a List of entities.

methods.name: convertToDtoList
methods.description: Converts a Collection of entities to a List of DTOs.

methods.name: convertToEntitySet
methods.description: Converts a Collection of DTOs to a Set of entities.

methods.name: convertToDtoSet
methods.description: Converts a Collection of entities to a Set of DTOs.
